metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17529 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - negligible.
metadata.Description: af/util/xp/ut_go_file.cpp in AbiWord 3.0.2-2 does not validate strings before launching the program specified by the BROWSER environment variable, which might allow remote attackers to conduct argument-injection attacks via a crafted URL.

notes.Note: ebarretto> According to Debian: non-issue, nothing exploitable, should be rejected

criterions.comment: abiword package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
